text: Ödön Földessy (1 July 1929 – 9 June 2020) was a Hungarian athlete. He competed in the long jump. He was born in Békés. He competed for Hungary in the men's long jump event at the 1952 Summer Olympics, where he won the bronze medal.Meghalt Földessy Ödön olimpiai bronzérmes távolugró Földessy died in Budapest on 9 June 2020, aged 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary Category:Medalists at the 1952 Summer Olympics
title: Ödön Földessy
